item.title: Ruby 30 min 热身
item.description: ruby-lang times 3.times do print 'Welcome ' end # Welcome Welcome Welcome 2 + 6 2 + 6 4 * 10 5 - 12 30 / 4 "Jimmy" # 7.5 puts puts 4 * 10 puts 5 - 12 puts 30 / 4 string "Jimmy".reverse # ymmiJ "Jimmy".length # 5 "Jimmy" * 5 # JimmyJimmyJimmyJimmyJimmy 40.to_s.reverse # 04 poem.gsub("toast", "honeydew") poem.reverse poem.lines.reverse puts poem.lines.reverse.join array [12, 47, 35] [12, 47, 35].
